name: RushBall Royale
description:
Hello!

This is my first game ever, I don't have any experience on the field, so all the criticism is very welcome. I have found the game development passion while making this game, from coding to game design. So even just having you guys experiment it, would be a great honour for me. About the game, basically it is a simple 3D platformer, where you have to control a ball from point A to B, the catch is that there is a "storm", therefore the name "Royale" and also a timer to register you best time. This is a prototype from what could be a party "rage" game. Leave me feedback! 

Thank you.
